Radiology Information System (RIS)
A specialized system for managing medical imaging and radiology departments. Core Functionalities:
• Imaging order entry and tracking • Scheduling radiology appointments • Image reporting and interpretation • Integration with PACS and EHR • Billing for imaging services
Workflows: • Order entry → Image acquisition → Radiologist report → Result delivery
Data Types: • Imaging orders, DICOM metadata, radiology reports, CPT codes
Integration Points: • PACS: For image storage and retrieval • EHR/HIS: For clinical context and billing • LIMS: If integrated with pathology
Example Software: • Carestream RIS • GE Centricity RIS • Philips IntelliSpace RIS • Cerner RadNet
• Relationships:
o Integrates with → EHR: Shares radiology reports with patient records o Integrates with → PACS: For image workflow management o Used by → Radiology Department: Primary users of the system o Runs on → VM Host Cluster: For reliability and performance
